question: John is sitting in a toilet stall in a bathroom, outside he can hear cars going around in circles.  What is the function of the place he is most likely at?
pos_explaination:
Race track is a place where cars race.
Cars race in circles in a race track.
John was sitting in the bathroom beside a race track.
neg_explaination:
The function of a place where cars go in circles is not eating food.
The function of a place where cars go in circles is not public place.
The function of a place where cars go in circles is not at hotel.
The function of a place where cars go in circles is not public building.
combined_explaination: Race track is a place where cars race in circles. John was sitting in the bathroom beside a race track where he can hear cars going around in circles. The function of such a place is to be a race track and not anything from the other options.
